gcci.text: At $3.17/hr for H100s, hardware scarcity continues to drive premium pricing while capex commitments signal supply chain normalization through 2025.

gtpi.text: API pricing at $1.25/1M tokens reflects intense competition compressing margins while efficiency gains enable sustainable volume growth.

gagl.text: 120 TWh annual AI load represents critical grid infrastructure strain requiring immediate capacity expansion and renewable integration planning.

aipi.text: Infrastructure investment surge suggests industry confidence despite bubble risks, with sustainable growth dependent on operational efficiency improvements.
